Nīnau e hoʻomaka: Yesterday
Louise he kumu ʻōlelo Pelekani e kōkua aku ana iā ʻoe ma ka hoʻomaikaʻi i kou ʻikepili!
ʻO Gabriel ke kiʻi ʻōlelo Palani e kōkua ana iāʻoe ma ke kākoʻo i kou leʻaleʻa ʻana ma ka ʻimi i ʻōlelo hou!
‘O Rakesh kekahi haumāna ʻo ‘India nāna e kōkua iā ʻoe me ka hoʻopuka ʻana i kou hulahula! ‘OK’
Evelyn ʻo Evelyn he kākau inoa Kanakarita nāna e kōkua iāʻoe me ka hoʻonui ʻana i kou leʻaleʻaʻana!
Ahsan kekahi makamua hiki ke kanaka hana lapa\'au ʻo ia i ka huahana a ʻoluʻolu aku i kāu ʻōlelo!
Min ke kālai i ka \'ikepili no kou \"papa\'ākau,\" \'pili I ka po\'e Kanaka ma ka \'Ayina Kina.
